blocks.name: cnambpcma
blocks.content: ((a-b)+c)-a = c-a holds for complex numbers a,b,c. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 23-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnambpcma(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, c2), cmin, c0), co(c2, cmin, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), caddc, c2), cmin, c0), co(c2, cmin, c1), co(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmin, c0), caddc, c2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, c0), cmin, c1), caddc, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  addsubd(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc))
  subcl(c0, c1)
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmin, c0), caddc, c2, co(co(c0, cmin, c0), cmin, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cmin, c0), co(co(c0, cmin, c0), cmin, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  sub32(c0, c1, c0)
  3eqtrd(co(co(co(c0, cmin, c0), cmin, c1), caddc, c2), co(c2, cmin, c1), co(co(c0, cmin, c0), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(nat0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  subadd23d(co(c0, cmin, c0), c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c0), cc))
  anidms(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c0), cc))
  subcl(c0, c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, c0), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(nat0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1))))
  oveq1d(co(c0, cmin, c0), caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1), nat0, wcel(c0, cc))
  subid(c0)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, co(c2, cmin, c1)), co(c2, cmin, c1)))
  addid2d(co(c2, cmin, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), cc))
  subcl(c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: cnapbmcpd
blocks.content: ((a+b)-c)+d = ((a+d)+b)-c holds for complex numbers a,b,c,d. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 23-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnapbmcpd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c2), caddc, c3), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c3), caddc, c1), cmin, c2)))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c2), caddc, c3), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c3), caddc, c1), cmin, c2), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c3), cmin, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  addsubd(co(c0, caddc, c1), c3, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
  addcl(c0, c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c2, cc))
  simpl(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c3), cmin, c2, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), caddc, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  add32d(c0, c1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c0, cc))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c1, cc))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wcel(c3, cc))
  simpr(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
}

blocks.name: addsubeq0
blocks.content: The sum of two complex numbers is equal to the difference of these two complex numbers iff the subtrahend is 0. (Contributed by AV, 8-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm addsubeq0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmin, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0)))
} = {
  3bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmin, c1)), wceq(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1))), wceq(c1, cneg(c1)))
  eqeq2d(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  eqcomd(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  negsub(c0, c1)
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, cneg(c1))), wceq(c1, cneg(c1))), wcel(cneg(c1), cc))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cneg(c1), cc))
  negcl(c1)
  addcan(c0, c1, cneg(c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wb(wceq(c1, cneg(c1)), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  eqneg(c1)
}
